entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Two different ability scores of your choice increase by 1.

entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and typically live up to about a century.

entries.name: Subrace Choice
entries: Choose a regional heritage: Bilgewater, Demacia, or Freljord (other regions available).

entries.name: Tavern Toughness
entries: You gain the Tavern Brawler feat. (If your table disallows feats, substitute proficiency in one tool.)

entries.name: Vehicle Proficiency
entries: You are proficient with water vehicles.

entries.name: Demacian Bravery
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

entries.name: Extra Feat
entries: You have the Mage Slayer feat (or equivalent benefit as allowed by DM).

entries.name: Terrain Familiarity
entries: You gain advantage on checks for navigation and survival in arctic terrain and related Perception/Investigation checks.

entries.name: Extra Feat
entries: You have the Savage Attacker feat (or substitute similar trait per DM).
